summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fleet Management module (Phase 4) for multi-tenant logistics SaaS. All 22 backend API tests passed with 100% success rate. Frontend Fleet page loads correctly with all tabs (Vehicles, Drivers, Reminders) working properly. UI interactions for creating vehicles and drivers work correctly with proper toast notifications and data persistence.
seed_data_creation: Created test user session: test_fleet_session_1771018872390, tenant: test-fleet-tenant-1771018872390, user: test-fleet-user-1771018872390
context_for_next_testing_agent: Fleet Management module fully tested. Test session token can be reused for authenticated testing. Backend tests are in /app/backend/tests/test_fleet.py covering all CRUD operations for vehicles, drivers, compliance items, and reminders aggregation endpoint.
passed_tests: Backend API health check
Authentication working with test session
GET /api/vehicles - List vehicles for tenant
POST /api/vehicles - Create vehicle with all fields
GET /api/vehicles/{id} - Get vehicle with compliance items
PUT /api/vehicles/{id} - Update vehicle status and fields
DELETE /api/vehicles/{id} - Delete vehicle and compliance
POST /api/vehicles/{id}/compliance - Add compliance item
DELETE /api/vehicles/{id}/compliance/{id} - Delete compliance item
GET /api/drivers - List drivers for tenant
POST /api/drivers - Create driver with all fields
GET /api/drivers/{id} - Get driver with compliance items
PUT /api/drivers/{id} - Update driver status and fields
DELETE /api/drivers/{id} - Delete driver and compliance
POST /api/drivers/{id}/compliance - Add compliance item
DELETE /api/drivers/{id}/compliance/{id} - Delete compliance item
GET /api/reminders - Aggregation view with overdue, due_this_week, due_this_month, upcoming categories
Frontend: Fleet page accessible at /fleet route
Frontend: Fleet nav link visible in sidebar with Car icon
Frontend: Vehicles tab - Add/List/View vehicles working
Frontend: Drivers tab - Add/List/View drivers working
Frontend: Reminders tab - Shows 'All Clear' when no compliance items due
Frontend: Toast notifications for success actions
Frontend: Tab counts update correctly after add operations

verified_features.reminders_aggregation: Grouping by urgency (overdue, due_this_week, due_this_month) working
verified_features.fleet_navigation: Fleet nav item with Car icon visible in sidebar
verified_features.fleet_route: /fleet route protected and accessible with auth
